exports.createArtifactMetadata.invocation: cat ./service/createArtifactMetadata.sh | exec kubectl -n chaordicledger exec deploy/org1-admin-cli -c main -i -- /bin/bash

exports.deleteArtifactMetadata.invocation: cat ./service/deleteArtifactMetadata.sh | sed 's|{{metadataID}}|${metadataID}|g' | exec kubectl -n chaordicledger exec deploy/org1-admin-cli -c main -i -- /bin/bash

exports.getAllArtifactMetadata.invocation: cat ./service/getArtifact.sh | exec kubectl -n chaordicledger exec deploy/chaordicledger-ipfs -i -- /bin/sh
